thread.title_full: Heroes of the Storm Matchmaking Update Will Balance Battles Better

title: Heroes of the Storm Matchmaking Update Will Balance Battles Better
text: Heroes of the Storm Matchmaking Update Will Balance Battles Better Friday, 16 October 2015 (28 minutes ago) Blizzard has detailed upcoming matchmaking changes for its free-to-play MOBA Heroes of the Storm. According to a post on the game's forum, many of these changes are being implemented in response to feedback from players. Blizzard community manager Trikslyr laid out the changes, which include "a couple of bug fixes to help the ...
